thig1.12:1.1: No clue what Bhante Sujāto based his translation on. It seems quite far removed from the Pāli text. Yours is more accurate; another literal rendering could be 'desirous traits [should be] laid down', or 'one's desirous nature [should be] laid down'
thig1.12:1.2: Your translation is correct; Bhante Sujāto seems to have added the word 'awareness' despite its absence from the Pāli text.
thig1.12:1.3: 'paṭibaddha' means more like 'constricted' or 'trapped' instead of 'dependent'
